snippet.title: 『BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA』【1st PV】(EN)
snippet.description:
『BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA』
 - - - - - - - - - - 

A “horror and mystery tale” that will grind your heart into a pulp.

 - - - - - - - - - - 

This is a new horror adventure game by Ichimatsu Suzuka, who has gained popularity for his Japanese nostalgic horror games “GO HOME” and “YASO curse of soirée”.

The setting is Utagamachi, a town in Japan.
You accidentally come into contact with a horrifying incident hidden in this town, and a number of terrors attack you.
Will you be able to escape from Mount Utaga?

- - - - - - - - - - 

▼ Title Summary
Title: BAN: The Prologue of GUCHA GUCHA
Platform: Steam
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2987540
Official website: https://creatorslab.kodansha.co.jp/game/
Supported languages: Japanese / English
Release date: Fall 2024
Genre: Horror adventure
Players: 1 player
Creator: Suzuka Ichimatsu (@SZK_Vdoll)
Publisher: Kodansha Ltd.

#GUCHAGUCHA
